entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 20.
